thread.title: Who Is Rose Sombke? Meet 'Bachelor' Fan Favorite Contestant on Grant Ellis' Season
thread.title_full: Who Is Rose Sombke? Meet 'Bachelor' Fan Favorite Contestant on Grant Ellis' Season

author: Katherine Schaffstall
title: Who Is Rose Sombke? Meet 'Bachelor' Fan Favorite Contestant on Grant Ellis' Season
text:
Rose Sombke became a fan favorite on Grant Ellis ’ season of The Bachelor . After self-eliminating during week four, fans wanted to know more about who Rose is, what she does for a living and more.
Who Is ‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke? “Rose has a big heart and an even bigger personality. She describes herself as romantic, optimistic and goofy, and says she has always been the caregiver in relationships,” according to her bio on the ABC website. “When it comes to finding a partner, Rose has high standards and isn’t planning on lowering them (as she shouldn’t!).”
Who Do You Want to See as the Next Golden Bachelor? What Does ‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke Look for in a Romance Partner? On her journey to find love, Rose hopes “to meet a man who is confident , loving, fun and will earn the approval of her friends.”
“In her free time, Rose likes to spend time at the beach, explore new places, and hit the town for a fun night out,” her bio reads. “She hopes that she’ll be the only ROSE Grant needs, and we hope she’s right!”
Where Is ‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke From? Rose’s hometown is Chicago, Illinois, and she appears to still be living in the area as an adult.
Bachelor's Grant Ellis Was Conflicted, Had to Be Nudged to Pick Final Girl What Is ‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke’s Job? She currently works as a registered nurse, according to her bio on the ABC website.
How Old Is ‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke? Rose is 27 years old, and was the same age when she made her reality TV debut. In June 2024, Rose documented her birthday festivities with a sentimental Instagram post.
Joey Graziadei's ‘The Bachelor’ Cast Revealed: Meet the 32 Contestants “Birthday weekend was certainly eventful and I can’t thank these people enough for making it so so so so special when I wasn’t sure if I wanted to celebrate and it was last minute (sorry) and special s/o to my big sister for a weekend I’ll never forget, love you all,” she wrote alongside several snapshots from the celebration. “Ty for helping me celebrate me (I never do) xo.”
‘The Bachelor’ Contestant Rose Sombke Loves to Travel While Rose’s Instagram account doesn’t share too many personal details about herself, the posts make it clear that she loves to travel. Over the years, she’s gone on trips to places including Toronto, Mexico, Belgium and Colorado.
What Is ‘The Bachelor’ Star Grant Ellis Looking for in a Romantic Partner? Prior to the season premiere, Grant insisted he was looking for a serious relationship in a promotional clip shared by People .
“I’m looking for love,” he said at the time about his intentions. “I want a wife. I’m searching for the happiness.”
Crosswords Celebrity Crossword 126 Play now While he noted that he chose a nontraditional path to find a partner, Grant said that in order “to get what you want out of life, you have to take a chance.”
“Love is a choice. Love is hard,” he continued. “But ultimately, the hardest things have the biggest reward.”
Rose Sombke Self-Eliminated During Season 29 of ‘The Bachelor’ Rose decided to take herself out of the competition for Grant’s heart during week four of the season, in the episode that aired on February 17, 2025.
Deal of the Day These ‘Cloud-Soft’ Sandals Are 53% Off Today View Deal The week prior during a group date, Grant told Rose that he was “thinking” about her while dancing with contestant Carolina Sofia during a group date. Rose told Carolina what Grant said, and the Puerto Rico native felt betrayed and confronted Grant about the claim.
Rose told Carolina that she felt “f–ked” by her “big time,” explaining that she thought she was confiding in a friend when she repeated what Grant had told her.
Bachelor’s Carolina Claps Back at Criticism Over Grant Relationship Concerns While Grant told her he felt they still had chemistry, Rose thought her situation with Carolina put her too far behind to compete any further. She told Grant ahead of the rose ceremony that she was leaving the show, while Grant said he was “hurt” but understood her decision.
“I’ve been fighting myself for a long time, like, fighting to stay and fighting through my own emotions. Everything that happened with Carolina invalidated so much about my relationship that was so good,” Rose explained in a confessional. “This is definitely a tipping point for me.”
